biotools.summary: FlowAnd is designed to analyze and integrate largescale, multi-color flow cytometry data. It implements methods for data importing, various transformations, several clustering algorithms for automatic clustering, visualization tools as well as straightforward statistical testing.

bioschemas.name: FlowAnd
bioschemas.summary: FlowAnd is designed to analyze and integrate largescale, multi-color flow cytometry data. It implements methods for data importing, various transformations, several clustering algorithms for automatic clustering, visualization tools as well as straightforward statistical testing.
